article_title: Health insurance choices for small business
article_text: Tim Stuhldreher is a Lancaster Newspapers staff writer who covers business and finance. He can be reached at tstuhldreher@lnpnews.com or (717) 481-6137. You can also follow@timstuhldreher on Twitter.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , health insurance, affordable care act, small business
article_metadata.author: TIM STUHLDREHER | Business Writer

og.description: For some small companies hit by surging health insurance premiums, the solution is one that large companies have used for years: self-funding.
